title: Can a woman lift up her abaya to avoid stepping on mud, dirt, water or a dirty area? Assim al hakeem
transcript: but from bangladesh if a woman is walking and there is mud and water is it permissible for her to raise up her abaya so that it would not be wet or tarnished with with this impurity or this dirt the answer is yes insha allah and she must be careful not to be seen to the best of her ability
